commits.author: Steven Rowe
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Returns true iff this implementation scores docs only out of order. This * method is used in conjunction with {@link Collector}'s * {@link Collector#acceptsDocsOutOfOrder() acceptsDocsOutOfOrder} and * {@link #scorer(AtomicReaderContext, boolean, boolean, Bits)} to * create a matching {@link Scorer} instance for a given {@link Collector}, or * vice versa. *

* NOTE: the default implementation returns false, i.e. * the Scorer scores documents in-order. */ public boolean scoresDocsOutOfOrder() { return false; }
commits.sourceOld:

This * method is used in conjunction with {@link Collector}'s * {@link Collector#acceptsDocsOutOfOrder() acceptsDocsOutOfOrder} and * {@link #scorer(AtomicReaderContext, boolean, boolean, Bits)} to * create a matching {@link Scorer} instance for a given {@link Collector}, or * vice versa. *

* NOTE: the default implementation returns false, i.e. * the Scorer scores documents in-order. */ public boolean scoresDocsOutOfOrder() { return false; }
